CoApplicant_ShowHide: show this content control if data exists for Project.Opportunity.CoApplicant.FirstName or Project.Opportunity.CoApplicant.LastName otherwise hide
RealEstate: show this control only when the value of LoanType value is RealEstate
Commercial: show this control only when value of LoanType value is Commercial
VariableInterest: show this control only when value of  InterestRateType is 'Variable'
FixedInterest: show this control only when value of InterestRateType is 'Fixed'
